alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny; Morton; Scott; Seward; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 1:18PM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Risk of Wildfire Spread Expected Sunday Afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043, 061, 062, 063, 074, 075, 076, 084, 085, AND 086... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny, Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney, Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton, Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton, Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens and Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control rapidly. Given the background drought conditions and very dry and dormant fuels, any outdoor burning, or any activities involving sparks or flames, are strongly discouraged Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Grant; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny; Morton; Scott; Seward; Stanton; Stevens
